io.netty.buffer

接口 ByteBufHolder

  • 所有超级接口:
    ReferenceCounted
    所有已知实现类:
    DatagramPacket, DefaultByteBufHolder

    public interface ByteBufHolder
extends ReferenceCounted
    A packet which is send or receive.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ByteBuf content()
      Return the data which is held by this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder copy()
      Creates a deep copy of this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder duplicate()
      Duplicates this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder replace(ByteBuf content)
      Returns a new ByteBufHolder which contains the specified content.
      ByteBufHolder retain()
      Increases the reference count by 1.
      ByteBufHolder retain(int increment)
      Increases the reference count by the specified increment.
      ByteBufHolder retainedDuplicate()
      Duplicates this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder touch()
      Records the current access location of this object for debugging purposes.
      ByteBufHolder touch(Object hint)
      Records the current access location of this object with an additional arbitrary information for debugging purposes.

      • 从接口继承的方法 io.netty.util.ReferenceCounted

        refCnt, release, release

    • 方法详细资料

      • content

        ByteBuf content()
        Return the data which is held by this ByteBufHolder.

      • copy

        ByteBufHolder copy()
        Creates a deep copy of this ByteBufHolder.

      • duplicate

        ByteBufHolder duplicate()
        Duplicates this ByteBufHolder. Be aware that this will not automatically call retain().

      • retainedDuplicate

        ByteBufHolder retainedDuplicate()
        Duplicates this ByteBufHolder. This method returns a retained duplicate unlike duplicate().
        另请参阅:
        ByteBuf.retainedDuplicate()

      • replace

        ByteBufHolder replace(ByteBuf content)
        Returns a new ByteBufHolder which contains the specified content.

      • retain

        ByteBufHolder retain()
        从接口复制的说明: ReferenceCounted
        Increases the reference count by 1.
        指定者:
        retain 在接口中 ReferenceCounted

      • retain

        ByteBufHolder retain(int increment)
        从接口复制的说明: ReferenceCounted
        Increases the reference count by the specified increment.
        指定者:
        retain 在接口中 ReferenceCounted

      • touch

        ByteBufHolder touch()
        从接口复制的说明: ReferenceCounted
        Records the current access location of this object for debugging purposes. If this object is determined to be leaked, the information recorded by this operation will be provided to you via ResourceLeakDetector. This method is a shortcut to touch(null).
        指定者:
        touch 在接口中 ReferenceCounted

      • touch

        ByteBufHolder touch(Object hint)
        从接口复制的说明: ReferenceCounted
        Records the current access location of this object with an additional arbitrary information for debugging purposes. If this object is determined to be leaked, the information recorded by this operation will be provided to you via ResourceLeakDetector.
        指定者:
        touch 在接口中 ReferenceCounted
